spellcasting.name: 1 Spellcasting
headerEntries: Spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to hit with spell attacks.

trait.name: Rebuke the Violent ( /short rest>)
entries: Magnus can use his Channel Divinity to rebuke those who use violence. Immediately after an attacker within 30 feet of him deals damage with an attack against a creature other than him, he can use his reaction to force the attacker to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker takes radiant damage equal to the damage it just dealt. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

trait.name: Necrotic Shroud ( /long rest)
entries: As an action, Magnus can transform for up to one minute, causing all creatures within 10 ft. to make a CHA saving throw ({@dc 16}) or be {@condition frightened} of him until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Lay on Hands
entries: Magnus has a pool of healing power that can restore 50 HP per long rest. As an action, he can touch a creature to restore any number of HP remaining in the pool, or 5 HP to either cure a disease or neutralize a poison affecting the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Magnus attacks twice on his turn.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) slashing damage.
